column4: how did you add it to grub? if you made changes to /etc/default/grub .. don't forget to run 'sudo update-grub'

in the grub menu I pressed 'e' and replaced "quiet splash" with "nomodeset". I have not made any changes to any files yet. Can't get into Ubuntu. But now I'm baffled - I just rebooted my system and it works. I didn't even do anything! Why would Ubuntu sometimes not work and other times do!?
so many things could play a part in the boot cycle.. without a detailed view from logs that's hard to answer
no worries, I understand. thank you though
